name: Resurrection (WhiffKin)
description:
This game was made in a week for submission to the Brakeys game jam 2023.1. 

The controls are WASD for movement, Left Click, Right Click, and Shift for abilities, and use the mouse to aim.

For controller, Left Stick for movement, Right Stick for aim,  Left Shoulder, Right Shoulder, and A (Xbox) for abilities.

You fell victim to occult sacrifice and need to fight your way out of the crypt and destroy the Pillars of Sacrifice to dismantle the spell keeping you trapped. Can you brave the crypt?
